name: Lizard Chef
description:
Dear Lizard Chef,

We are excited to have you on our show, "Ten Second Chef"! Please bring your A-game in preparing the highest quality fast food items. Take a deep breath and meet us at "the ring" tomorrow at noon. Surviving there could bring you fame and prestige in the cooking world!

See you soon, DHY - TV

CONTROLS:

-WASD

-SPACE to Dash

-All other mechanics in tutorial
